name: Princess Monster Girl-DressUp Game Pokemon Edition
name_original: Princess Monster Girl-DressUp Game Pokemon Edition
description:
Rumor has it in Monster city that the annual cute Pokemon contest will be next week. You quickly check on the Internet only to see that this is indeed true. You have only seven days to match up against the city’s most Pokemon!!!

Pokemon Girl Dress Up puts you in a situation where you can show your fashion and dress up your own unique and unbelievably sweet monster pony. Only in this way you can achieve a version that is fitting for a winner in the city’s best pokemon contest.

Get your groove on and put that fashion taste and creativity into good use. Create the cutest Pokemon Girl with the most outstanding and fashionable clothes and accessories.

------ How to Play ------


Pokemon Girl Dress up has a simple and fun gameplay. You can dress up your Pokemon by customizing every piece of clothing and accessory. The game is rich on customization so you can achieve whatever fashion ideas you have in mind.

You can customise your pony’s hair, head accessory, dress, necklace and environment.

The game is free to play. You can however pay a small fee to have specific pony models , as well as high class accessories or pieces of clothing unlocked.

What are you waiting for? Download Now!!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please rate this game and let us know what you think ! Your feedback is very important for me.
